com.deitel

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deitel.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains the time in 24-hour format.
    See Also:
    Object

      • setTime

        public void setTime(int hour,
           int minute,
           int second)
        Set a new time value using universal time. Perform validity checks on the data. Set invalid values to zero.
        Parameters:
        hour - the hour
        minute - the minute
        second - the second
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In the case of an invalid time
        See Also:
        setHour(int), setMinute(int), setSecond(int)
